Name: Road Flash
About the game: Road Flash is a racing game inspired by the visuals, games and cars from the late 80s and early 90s. A game suitable for those who love arcade games and nostalgia. There are 5 different maps and 6 different vehicles in total. With the points you earn, you can unlock new cars and maps. We also added a small combination cheat so that you can pass all the levels. (Use the arrow keys)
